name: truss: episode 0
description:
♦♣♠♥

a trip to a strange realm leads to debt;

you have 10 minutes to pay the money back,

or else your soul will be harvested;

earn money by gambling

♦♣♠♥

truss is still in development;

for this current episode,
the next steps are mainly bug fixes + polish,
as well as adding more interactions + npcs

future episodes will be more narrative-focused

♦♣♠♥

post in the discussion board if you have any feedback
or encounter any bugs!

♦♣♠♥

[ episode 0 of truss was made with support from Sundae Month ]
